sourcesContent: import { Toast, ToastBody, ToastHeader, Spinner, Row, Col } from 'reactstrap' const logo = ( ) const close = ( ) const ToastHeaderIcons = () => { return ( Vuexy This is a toast with a primary icon — check it out! Vuexy This is a toast with a success icon — check it out! Vuexy This is a toast with a info icon — check it out! Vuexy This is a toast with a danger icon — check it out! Vuexy This is a toast with a warning icon — check it out! Vuexy This is a toast with a dark icon — check it out! }> Vuexy This is a toast with a spinner — check it out! Vuexy This is a toast with a logo — check it out! ) } export default ToastHeaderIcons
